Package cbf.harness

Classes necessary to initialize the framework configurations.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppDriverLoader
    Loads the module driver and browser drivers after bootstrap
    Harness
    Main class used by different runners Synposis: Harness.initialize("configFilePath", runtimeOverrides) // load configuration For each thread: Harness h = new Harness("name") // load engine and reporters try { appDriver = h.loadAppDriver(runArgs) for each test by thread with runArgs h.getEngine().runTestcase(tcMaker1) } finally { h.finalize(); // to close any resources } Harness.finalize(); // in the end
    ReportingManager
    Helper class for reporting purposes
    ResourcePaths
    Initializes all paths like auto home, work home and run home

Package cbf.harness Description

Classes necessary to initialize the framework configurations. such as initializing the reporters,resource paths,app drivers,logs,load framework and user defined configurations etc
Author:
Capgemini
